title: The Adventures of Mark Twain [1944 - USA] biopic
description:
The Adventures of Mark Twain (1944 - USA)

Adventure / Biography / Drama

starring . . . . Fredric March, Alexis Smith, Donald Crisp
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0036582/


NOMINATED for 3 Oscars - Best Art Direction, Best Effects, Best Music

This biopic tells the story of how Samuel Langhorn Clemens became the renowned author Mark Twain. Growing up in the 1830s in Hannibal, Mississippi, Clemens works as a riverboat pilot on the Mississippi River. After he finds a picture of a beautiful girl and vows to marry her, he quits his job and travels to Nevada in search of gold with his friend Steve. In the midst of the Civil War, Clemens begins writing prolifically, thus beginning his famed career.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 706x476, 23.976 fps, 2103 Kbps, 02h10m08s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, optional English subtitles
